issue.title: [C++][Python][Compute] Number to string hex conversion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13774](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13774). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add compute function to support integer to string hexadecimal conversion, similar to Python's **hex()** function.
```python

>>> hex(10)
'0xa'
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13774?focusedCommentId=17407853) by Eduardo Ponce (edponce):*
Arrow already supports some hex parsing support by HexEncode but it is not exposed as a compute function.
